attributes.action: Change DWP rules to make a claimant's GP the ultimate decision maker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition The Prime Minister to change DWP rules regarding the decision on whether a claimant is fit for work by placing this decision, ultimately, in the hands of the claimant’s GP via advice from the claimant’s NHS consultant/s where appropriate and with the DWP advisors and doctors being in consultation with those doctors and consultants, reviewing the claimant’s case together.
